item.title: 打印零和奇偶数
item.author: vllbc
item.description: 打印零和奇偶数 多线程问题，利用线程锁可以轻松解决 https://leetcode-cn.com/problems/print-zero-even-odd/ class ZeroEvenOdd: def __init__(self, n): from threading import Lock self.n = n self.zerolock = Lock() self.oddlock = Lock() self.evenlock = Lock() self.oddlock.acquire() self.evenlock.acquire() # printNumber(x) outputs "x", where x is an integer. def zero(self, printNumber: 'Callable[[int], None]') -> None: for i in range(1,self.n+1): self.zerolock.acquire() printNumber(0)
